attributes.action: Revoke the MBE given to Barry Ferguson the former Scotland international.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that Barry Ferguson should not be able to retain his MBE as he has embarrassed himself and the nation on the international sporting stage and we believe that this shows he shouldn't have received an honour and this type of behaviour embarrasses and undermines the order. We believe that his MBE should be cancelled and annulled and that his name shall be erased from the Register of the said Order.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office looks after nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours for all queries relating to honours.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
